page.title: 04CHARLTON_HANK.HOME LIFE
page.content: {Agatype cookers}predominate in the farm houses,but other households depend on electricity,several have microwave ovens,some people use bottle gas,there being no gas in the area .Most homes have{deep freezers,}many householders grow their own produce to freeze.Many young wives work part time and find convenience foods useful,but the local W.I.&Wives Clubs have encouraged an increased interest in cooking.Most households take their main meal in the evening but the farmers usually find it more conven- ient to have the{more tradional {mid_day meal. }Dogs, cats, rabbits, budgerigars,fish, hamsters and guinea pigs are among the many{pets}kept.A few children have their own pony,but many more visit riding schools.Videos & computers feature in many homes with the inevitable television.
